name: PoolConfigurator
description: PoolConfigurator. Implements the configuration methods for the Aave protocol*.

eventDecorators.name: ATokenUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an aToken implementation is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: BorrowCapChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the borrow cap of a reserve is updated.

eventDecorators.name: BorrowableInIsolationChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the reserve is set as borrowable/non borrowable in isolation mode.

eventDecorators.name: BorrowingDisabledOnReserve
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when borrowing is disabled on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: BorrowingEnabledOnReserve
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when borrowing is enabled on a reserve.

eventDecorators.name: BridgeProtocolFeeUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the bridge protocol fee is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: CollateralConfigurationChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the collateralization risk parameters for the specified asset are updated.

eventDecorators.name: DebtCeilingChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the debt ceiling of an asset is set.

eventDecorators.name: EModeCategoryAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new eMode category is added.

eventDecorators.name: FlashloanPremiumToProtocolUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a the part of the premium that goes to protocol is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: FlashloanPremiumTotalUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a the total premium on flashloans is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationProtocolFeeChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the liquidation protocol fee of a reserve is updated.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveActivated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve is activated.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveDeactivated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve is deactivated.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveDecimalsChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the reserve decimals are updated.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveDropped
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve is dropped.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveFactorChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve factor is updated.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveFrozen
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve is frozen.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveInitialized
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve is initialized.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveInterestRateStrategyChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve interest strategy contract is updated.

eventDecorators.name: ReservePaused
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve is paused.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveUnfrozen
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve is unfrozen.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveUnpaused
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a reserve is unpaused.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: RiskAdminRegistered
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new risk admin is registered.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: RiskAdminUnregistered
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a risk admin is unregistered.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: StableDebtTokenUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation of a stable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: StableRateDisabledOnReserve
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when stable rate borrowing is disabled on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: StableRateEnabledOnReserve
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when stable rate borrowing is enabled on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: fallbackOracle
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the fallback oracle.

eventDecorators.name: SupplyCapChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the supply cap of a reserve is updated.

eventDecorators.name: UnbackedMintCapChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the unbacked mint cap of a reserve is updated.

eventDecorators.name: VariableDebtTokenUpgraded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

functionDecorators.name: activateReserve
functionDecorators.description: Activates a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: configureReserveAsCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Configures the reserve collateralization parameters. all the values are expressed in percentages with two decimals of precision. A valid value is 10000, which means 100.00%.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: ltv
parameterDecorators.description: The loan to value of the asset when used as collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidationThreshold
parameterDecorators.description: The threshold at which loans using this asset as collateral will be considered undercollateralized.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidationBonus
parameterDecorators.description: The bonus liquidators receive to liquidate this asset. The values is always above 100%. A value of 105% means the liquidator will receive a 5% bonus*.

functionDecorators.name: deactivateReserve
functionDecorators.description: Deactivates a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: disableBorrowingOnReserve
functionDecorators.description: Disables borrowing on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: disableReserveStableRate
functionDecorators.description: Disable stable rate borrowing on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: dropReserve
functionDecorators.description: Drops a reserve entirely.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the reserve to drop*.

functionDecorators.name: enableBorrowingOnReserve
functionDecorators.description: Enables borrowing on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: borrowCap
parameterDecorators.description: The borrow cap for this specific asset, in absolute units of tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: stableBorrowRateEnabled
parameterDecorators.description: True if stable borrow rate needs to be enabled by default on this reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: enableReserveStableRate
functionDecorators.description: Enable stable rate borrowing on a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: freezeReserve
functionDecorators.description: Freezes a reserve. A frozen reserve doesn't allow any new supply, borrow or rate swap but allows repayments, liquidations, rate rebalances and withdrawals.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: initReserves
functionDecorators.description: Initializes multiple reserves.

parameterDecorators.name: input
parameterDecorators.description: The array of initialization parameters*.

functionDecorators.name: setBorrowCap
functionDecorators.description: Updates the borrow cap of a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: borrowCap
parameterDecorators.description: The new borrow of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: setBorrowableInIsolation
functionDecorators.description: Sets the borrowable in isolation flag for the reserve. When this flag is set to true, the asset will be borrowable against isolated collaterals and the borrowed amount will be accumulated in the isolated collateral's total debt exposure. Only assets of the same family (eg USD stablecoins) should be borrowable in isolation mode to keep consistency in the debt ceiling calculations.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: borrowable
parameterDecorators.description: True if the asset should be borrowable in isolation, false otherwise*.

functionDecorators.name: setDebtCeiling
functionDecorators.description: Sets the debt ceiling for an asset.

parameterDecorators.name: ceiling
parameterDecorators.description: The new debt ceiling.

functionDecorators.name: setEModeCategory
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new eMode category.

parameterDecorators.name: categoryId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the category to be configured.

parameterDecorators.name: ltv
parameterDecorators.description: The ltv associated with the category.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidationThreshold
parameterDecorators.description: The liquidation threshold associated with the category.

parameterDecorators.name: liquidationBonus
parameterDecorators.description: The liquidation bonus associated with the category.

parameterDecorators.name: oracle
parameterDecorators.description: The oracle associated with the category. If 0x0, the default assets oracles will be used to compute the overall.

parameterDecorators.name: label
parameterDecorators.description: a label identifying the category debt and overcollateralization of the users using this category.*.

functionDecorators.name: setLiquidationProtocolFee
functionDecorators.description: Updates the liquidation protocol fee of reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: fee
parameterDecorators.description: The new supply of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: setPoolPause
functionDecorators.description: Pauses or unpauses all the actions of the protocol, including aToken transfers Effectively it pauses every reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: val
parameterDecorators.description: True if protocol needs to be paused, false otherwise*.

functionDecorators.name: setReserveFactor
functionDecorators.description: Updates the reserve factor of a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: reserveFactor
parameterDecorators.description: The new reserve factor of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: setReserveInterestRateStrategyAddress
functionDecorators.description: Sets the interest rate strategy of a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: rateStrategyAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The new address of the interest strategy contract*.

functionDecorators.name: setReservePause
functionDecorators.description: Pauses a reserve. A paused reserve does not allow any interaction (supply, borrow, repay, swap interestrate, liquidate, atoken transfers).

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: val
parameterDecorators.description: True if pausing the reserve, false if unpausing*.

functionDecorators.name: setSupplyCap
functionDecorators.description: Updates the supply cap of a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: supplyCap
parameterDecorators.description: The new supply of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: setUnbackedMintCap
functionDecorators.description: Updates the unbacked mint cap of reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: unbackedMintCap
parameterDecorators.description: The new unbacked mint cap of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: unfreezeReserve
functionDecorators.description: Unfreezes a reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: updateAToken
functionDecorators.description: Updates the aToken implementation for the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: input
parameterDecorators.description: The aToken update paramenters*.

functionDecorators.name: updateBridgeProtocolFee
functionDecorators.description: Updates the bridge fee collected by the protocol reserves.

parameterDecorators.name: protocolFee
parameterDecorators.description: The part of the fee sent to protocol.

functionDecorators.name: updateFlashloanPremiumToProtocol
functionDecorators.description: Updates the flash loan premium collected by protocol reserves.

parameterDecorators.name: flashloanPremiumToProtocol
parameterDecorators.description: The part of the premium sent to protocol.

functionDecorators.name: updateFlashloanPremiumTotal
functionDecorators.description: Updates the total flash loan premium flash loan premium consist in 2 parts - A part is sent to aToken holders as extra balance - A part is collected by the protocol reserves.

parameterDecorators.name: flashloanPremiumTotal
parameterDecorators.description: The total premium in bps.

functionDecorators.name: updateStableDebtToken
functionDecorators.description: Updates the stable debt token implementation for the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: input
parameterDecorators.description: The stableDebtToken update parameters*.

functionDecorators.name: updateVariableDebtToken
functionDecorators.description: Updates the variable debt token implementation for the asset.

parameterDecorators.name: input
parameterDecorators.description: The variableDebtToken update parameters*.
